short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is required to use the KNAPS POS application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will permit use of the KNAPS POS application.
It will detect multiple tabs open with the same URL and warn the user to close one of the duplicate tabs.
